      • insertSelf

        public void insertSelf(Node startNode)
        insertSelf This method is called on a new node that hasn't been put into the HyPeerWeb yet.
        Parameters:
        startNode -
        Precondition:
        start node is part of a valid HyPeerWeb. This node is not part of the HyPeerWeb.
        Postcondition:
        This node will be part of the HyPeerWeb and all connections will be modified to match the project constraints
